snippet: Mitch Hurwitz, the show’s creator, and two of its stars, Will Arnett and Jeffrey Tambor, talked about fans’ demand for a film at the South by Southwest festival.
abstract: Mitch Hurwitz, the show’s creator, and two of its stars, Will Arnett and Jeffrey Tambor, talked about fans’ demand for a film at the South by Southwest festival.

headline.main: New 'Arrested Development' Episodes Aren't Enough for Some Fans

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
